data.comment: Rotherham kick-off to get the first-half underway.
Matt Crooks (Rotherham) gets a yellow card.
In the minute 45, The ref's whistle signals the end of the first-half.
Brentford kick-off the second-half u- the match is underway again!
Richard Wood is booked for the home team.
In the minute 57, Marcus Forss scores to make it 0-1 at AESSEAL New York Stadium.
That's a fine assist from Ivan Toney.
Paul Warne is making the team's first substitution at AESSEAL New York Stadium with Mikel Miller replacing Joe Mattock.
In the minute 71, The home team replace Matthew Olosunde with Florian Jozefzoon.
Rotherham's Mikel Miller has been booked in Rotherham.
At AESSEAL New York Stadium, Angus MacDonald has been yellow-carded for the home team.
In the minute 74, Brentford make their first substitution with Sergi Canos replacing Bryan Mbeumo.
Emiliano Marcondes is on a sub for Joshua Da Silva for Brentford.
George Hirst is replacing Freddie Ladapo for the home team.
In the minute 80, The home team replace Jamie Lindsay with Kyle Vassell.
Brentford have been awarded a penalty in Rotherham...
Ivan Toney gives Brentford a 0-2 lead from the penalty spot.
In the minute 82, Red card in Rotherham! Mikel Miller has been shown a second yellow card by Tim Robinson.
Saman Ghoddos is replacing Marcus Forss for the away team.
Aaron Pressley is replacing Ivan Toney for Brentford at AESSEAL New York Stadium.
The whistle has gone to end the second half. The match finishes 0-2.
